analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol:
	Contract PonyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol#345-346)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol)

TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol#391-401) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol#396)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/8/0x4597cbccecb17aadfb3344a5dccf6a5db8768cff.sol#97) is not in mixedCase
